sdsmt.edu.thompsonsamson.assignment2

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • sdsmt.edu.thompsonsamson.assignment2.Model

  • public class Model
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Class defining the data model used in this application. Creates the contact table and handles all of the creation, reading, updating and deleting of address book contacts. Logging functions were retained, but in an actual application, exceptions should be thrown and handled if there were problems with the database.
